abstract: Violators will face fines ranging from $5,000, for a first offense, to around $100,000.
snippet: Violators will face fines ranging from $5,000, for a first offense, to around $100,000.
lead_paragraph: Shark fin soup will be off the menu before long in Canada's largest city. After a frequently theatrical debate that included the flight of an inflatable shark around its chamber, the Toronto City Council voted this week to ban the consumption, possession and sale of shark fins.
